site.name: Genes Framework
site.description: Zero dependencies, multi-tenant ready, works with or without a database

features.title: Zero Dependencies
features.description: No Composer, npm, or build tools required. Just copy files and start coding.

features.title: Multi-Tenant Ready
features.description: Built-in clone-based isolation for SaaS platforms and multi-site applications.

features.title: Database Agnostic
features.description: Works with MySQL, SQLite, or no database at all. Your choice.

features.title: PHP 5.6+ Compatible
features.description: Runs on both legacy and modern servers without modification.

features.title: Single File Design
features.description: genes.php (~6,400 lines), genes.js (~1,300 lines). That's it.

features.title: AI-Friendly
features.description: Clear, readable, self-documenting code designed for humans and AI.
